LHRLAB/Graph-R1

Graph-R1 lets language models reason over knowledge graphs using multi-turn interactions and reinforcement learning for better question answering

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Builds knowledge graphs for agents
  • Synthesizes data using knowledge graphs
  • Reinforcement learning framework for language agents
  • turns text into knowledge graphs
  • Ask questions about a graph in natural language
  • Converts text into knowledge graphs
  • Graph native agentic system
  • reinforcement learning library for training large language models, supports many RL algorithms, integrates with LLM tools, scales to models with up to 671B parameters
  • Executes reasoning paths in parallel with language models
